mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum num ,t.* from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) t where 1=1
and gydw like '%'||(#{gydw})||'%'
and xzqhmc like '%'||(#{xzqhmc})||'%'
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and qlmc like '%'||(#{qlmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and sck_shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and akjfl like #{akjfl}||'%'
) t1 where t1.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t1.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by sck_sbzt desc

select count(*) from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) where 1=1
and gydw like '%'||(#{gydw})||'%'
and xzqhmc like '%'||(#{xzqhmc})||'%'
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and qlmc like '%'||(#{qlmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and sck_shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and akjfl like #{akjfl}||'%'
select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id where sckid=#{sckid}
mapper.delete: delete from sck_wqgz where sckid in(#{delstr})
mapper.update: update sck_wqgz set sck_shzt='已审核',sck_shsj=sysdate where sckid=#{sckid}
update sck_wqgz set sck_sbzt='已上报', sck_sbsj=sysdate where sckid in(#{delstr})
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum num ,t.* from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) t where sck_sbzt='已上报'
and gydw like '%'||(#{gydw})||'%'
and xzqhmc like '%'||(#{xzqhmc})||'%'
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and qlmc like '%'||(#{qlmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and akjfl like #{akjfl}||'%'
) t1 where t1.num <=(#{page} * #{rows}) and t1.num>(#{page}-1)*#{rows} order by sck_shzt desc

select count(*) from (select * from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id) where sck_sbzt='已上报'
and gydw like '%'||(#{gydw})||'%'
and xzqhmc like '%'||(#{xzqhmc})||'%'
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and qlmc like '%'||(#{qlmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and akjfl like #{akjfl}||'%'

select shzt v_0,gydw v_1,xzqhmc v_2,qlbh v_3,qlmc v_4,qlzxzh v_5,lxbm v_6,lxmc v_7,pddj v_8,xjgjnd v_9,xmnf v_10,jsxz v_11 from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id where 1=1
and gydw like '%'||(#{gydw})||'%'
and xzqhmc like '%'||(#{xzqhmc})||'%'
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and qlmc like '%'||(#{qlmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and sck_shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and akjfl like #{akjfl}||'%'

select shzt v_0,gydw v_1,xzqhmc v_2,qlbh v_3,qlmc v_4,qlzxzh v_5,lxbm v_6,lxmc v_7,pddj v_8,xjgjnd v_9,xmnf v_10,jsxz v_11 from sck_wqgz t join xmk_wqgz on xmkid=xmk_wqgz.id where 1=1 and sck_sbzt='已上报'
and gydw like '%'||(#{gydw})||'%'
and xzqhmc like '%'||(#{xzqhmc})||'%'
and lxmc like '%'||(#{lxmc})||'%'
and qlmc like '%'||(#{qlmc})||'%'
and xmnf like '%'||(#{xmnf})||'%'
and xmtype like '%'||(#{xmtype})||'%'
and sck_shzt like '%'||(#{shzt})||'%'
and jsdj like '%'||(#{jsdj})||'%'
and akjfl like #{akjfl}||'%'
select qlbh v_0,qlmc v_1,qlzxzh v_2,qlqc v_3,qlkd v_4 from xmk_wqgz where sbzt='已上报'
mapper.insert: insert into sck_wqgz(sckid,xmkid,fapgdw,fascdw,faspsj,spwh,tzgs,jsxz,jsnr,scbz,sck_sbzt,sck_shzt) values(sys_guid(),(select ID from XMK_WQGZ where qlbh=trim(#{0}) and qlmc=trim(#{1})),#{5},#{6},#{7},#{8},#{9},#{10},#{11},#{12},'未上报','未审核')
